model.name: RETAILDB
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE wine_pg ( wine_id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"wine_id"', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ranking integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ranking"', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), name string(255) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"name"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), country string(255) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"country"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), average_price integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"average_price"', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), max_price integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"max_price"', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT wine_pkey PRIMARY KEY(wine_id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"public"."wine"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')

model.name: Services
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW wine ( wine_id integer NOT NULL, ranking integer NOT NULL, name string(255) NOT NULL, country string(255) NOT NULL, average_price integer NOT NULL, max_price integer NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT wine_pkey PRIMARY KEY(wine_id) ) AS SELECT wine_id, ranking, name, country, average_price, max_price FROM RETAILDB.wine_pg;
